name: Springman (demo)
description:
This is Springman, a mockup rage game inspired by Jump King.

While I say inspired, it really only takes away the 'starting over' aspect of it, and not the actual gameplay itself. 

Biggest difference here is you're a Spring! Stranded in an otherworldly cave with low gravity, you seek its exit.

Expected play time: 20 minutes

This version is still in its demo phase. A lot of functionalities would naturally be missing. So do take note of the following:

  • No audio whatsoever.
  • No saving or loading states.
  • No settings.
  • A lot of physics bugs.
  • Barebones graphics.
  • Not as ragey as other rage games... yet.

Thank you so much for taking the time to view Springman (demo)! Please check out my other projects.
